channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: At least three drains blocked and no drain path through verge. Causes flooding every time it rains. Road has not been swept adding to blockage. Paths slippery and never cleared. Drenching of pedestrians., 13th February
item.description:
Drains on Manor Road on the Swindon Village side of the Swillgate Brook.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There are multiple large potholes, 13th February
item.description:
Outside the greyhound pub just after turning in from Cheltenham road. Some of these have been patched but hasnt resolved the problem. Still multiple untreated potholes that are getting worse! Having to drive over to the other side of the road to avoid. Needs a permanent resurface urgently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greyhound Gardens, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple large potholes on both mini roundabouts, 13th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Church Road, Longlevens, Gloucester

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 13th February
item.description:
Customer reports that the storm drain on the driveway at the location is overflowing and there is around an inch of standing water. STW and Tewkesbury Borough Council have stated that this is not their responsibility and have passed them to Highways. Please can this be investigated and cleared out.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 13th February
item.description:
